body_html:
ndim is necessary right now because it's needed in the constructor to infer the tuple size of stride/padding/groups.

I don't really like the idea of defining 4+ extra functions just to specify each possible value of ndim.

I don't really like the idea of defining 4+ extra functions just to specify each possible value of ndim.
body:
`ndim` is necessary right now because it's needed in the constructor to infer the tuple size of stride/padding/groups.

I don't really like the idea of defining 4+ extra functions just to specify each possible value of `ndim`.
